DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Confirm antitumor efficacy intracavitary interleukin-2 plus autologous lymphokine-activated killer cell patient primary , recurrent refractory malignant glioma . - Determine whether induction regional , intracavitary , eosinophilia prognosticator response immunotherapy long term survival patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive cytoreductive tumor surgery and/or biopsy implantation intracavitary Ommaya reservoir prior therapy induction . Patients undergo outpatient leukapheresis day -4 -5 , cell incubate ex vivo interleukin-2 ( IL-2 ) . Lymphokine-activated killer ( LAK ) cell IL-2 infused day 1 . Bolus infusion low-dose IL-2 administer day 3 , 5 , 8 , 10 , 12 , follow rest period day 13-24 . The course repeat day 25 start leukapheresis . Therapy course repeat 1 year stable disease response therapy . Maintenance dose repeat every 4-6 month thereafter . Disease restaging do every 8-12 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 30 patient per year enrol .
